person.persName: John B. Tilford, Jr. (Assistant Adjutant General of Kentucky)

body.p: Kentucky businessman, farmer, and soldier. Nephew of Lexington banker John B. Tilford. Served as a major and assistant adjutant general of Kentucky from 1864 to 1865.

bibl.p: "Maj. Tilford was Buried in Frankfort," Courier-Journal (Louisville, Ky.), May 23, 1902; _Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1 (Frankfort: John H. Harney, Public Printer, 1866), VII.
